product_name: Gerber Bear Grylls Scout Knife & Bracelet
long_description: Packaged with the Paracord Survival Bracelet, the Gerber Bear Grylls Scout Knife draws on Bear's experience as a Chief UK Scout and figurehead to millions of Scouts worldwide. Partially-serrated blade is made of high carbon stainless steel that offers great edge retention and rope-cutting ability. Dual-sided thumb stud allows easy opening with either hand. Ergonomic, textured-rubber grip maximizes comfort and minimizes slippage. Lock Back feature locks the blade securely in place when open and enhances safety when closing. Sturdy clip makes it easy to carry the knife on a pocket, belt or waistband. The Gerber Bear Grylls Scout Knife comes with the. 1-hand adjustable bracelet has 12 ft. of paracord and comes with an attached emergency whistle.
short_description: Packaged with the Paracord Survival Bracelet, the Gerber Bear Grylls Scout Knife draws on Bear's experience as a Chief UK Scout and figurehead to millions of Scouts worldwide.
